hero.title: ProfGSM IT Technical Service
hero.description: We offer professional computer and phone technical service in Istanbul. We also buy and sell second-hand devices. Customer satisfaction is our top priority.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At ProfGSM IT, we provide computer and phone repair services as well as second-hand device buying and selling. We offer fast and reliable service with our professional team.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: At ProfGSM IT, we provide comprehensive technical service for your computers, phones, and tablets. We solve all technical problems with our professional team.
services.computerRepairDesc: We solve your hardware and software problems, professionally perform part replacement and maintenance operations.
services.iphoneRepairDesc: We perform screen, battery, motherboard, speaker, and other part replacements on your iPhone devices with our expert team.
services.secondHandDesc: We buy and sell second-hand laptops, computers, phones, and tablets, and offer the highest price guarantee.
services.dataRecoveryDesc: We perform data recovery operations from damaged devices and safely back up your important data.
services.softwareInstallDesc: We install operating systems, update software, and install drivers.
services.tabletRepairDesc: We provide fast and effective solutions for all technical problems of your tablet devices.
services.partUpgradeDesc: We upgrade RAM, SSD, CPU, and graphics cards to improve your computer's performance.
services.screenReplacementDesc: We replace screens of all brands and models of mobile phones with original parts.

technicalService.title: Technical Service
technicalService.description: At ProfGSM IT, we provide professional technical service for your computers, phones, and tablets. We solve your device problems quickly and reliably with our expert team.
technicalService.laptopRepairDesc: Hardware and software problems, part replacement, and performance optimization. We solve all problems in your computer with our extensive spare parts inventory and experienced technicians.
technicalService.iphoneRepairDesc: Screen, battery, motherboard, camera replacement, and data recovery operations are performed by our professional team. Our Apple-certified technicians will quickly solve the problems with your device.
technicalService.secondHand: Second-Hand Laptop and Phone Buy & Sell
technicalService.secondHandDesc: We buy your second-hand devices with the highest price guarantee. You can also purchase guaranteed second-hand devices at affordable prices. All devices are checked and sold with a warranty.
technicalService.tabletRepairDesc: We quickly solve problems with your tablet devices with our special equipment and trained technicians for operations such as screen, battery, and motherboard replacement.
technicalService.partUpgradeDesc: We perform RAM, SSD, HDD, graphics card replacement, and system upgrade operations. We offer professional advice for the most suitable solutions to improve your device's performance.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: At ProfGSM IT, we provide service with our experienced technician staff. Our expert team is here to permanently solve problems with your devices.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Need technical service? ProfGSM IT team is with you for all your computer and phone problems.
